H0.text: What name links a Labour MP and a professional golfer. Nick Faldo

H1.text: What name links a Labour MP and a professional golfer. Tony Jacklin

H2.text: What name links a Labour MP and a professional golfer. Justin Rose

H3.text: What name links a Labour MP and a professional golfer. Tom Watson

A4.text: Tony Jacklin is an English golfer.

A5.text: He won two major championships, the 1969 Open Championship and the 1970 U.S. Open.
